events.message: I placed an order more than two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. I'm very concerned about the shipping delay.
The customer's complaint has been categorized under delivery delay due to late shipment and tracking concerns.
Assigning the case to the delivery support team to investigate the shipping delay reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I'll be happy to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can look into the delay for you?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. The tracking number provided on the website hasn’t updated since last week.
I’ve escalated this with the shipping service and they confirmed a delay due to weather issues. We expect your package to arrive within 3 more days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate the explanation and hope the package arrives soon without further delays.
Your issue has been resolved by providing the estimated delivery update and confirming shipment progress with the carrier.
Just checking in to confirm if your order has arrived and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now, assuming your order has been received. Thank you for your patience throughout this process.
